PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY: 
 
• Results Oriented data analyst with 3 years of experience in leveraging data science and 
analytics to drive business insights and optimize operational processes. 
 
• Designed and developed data pipelines, utilizing bigdata tools and Hadoop architecture for 
efficient data processing and transformation. 
 
• Designed machine learning algorithms, both supervised and unsupervised, to derive 
valuable patterns and predictions from complex datasets. 
 
• Completed pilot batch projects, demonstrating a proactive approach to problem-solving and 
an ability to adapt to new technologies and agile methodologies.  
 
• Proficient in MLOps (Machine Learning Operations) methodologies, ensuring seamless 
deployment and maintenance of machine learning models in production environments. 
 
• Mediated to communicate complex technical concepts through effective storytelling,

deployment and maintenance of machine learning models in production environments. 
 
• Mediated to communicate complex technical concepts through effective storytelling, 
enabling stakeholders to understand and make informed decisions based on data-driven 
insights.  
 
• Created visually appealing and interactive dashboards using different visualization tools, 
enabling users to explore data and extract actionable information. 
 
 
 
 
 
TECHNICAL SKILL 
 
• Programming Languages (Scripting) : Python, R, SAS 
• Cloud Based Technologies. : AWS 
• Business Intelligence Tools : Tableau, Power BI 
• Machine Learning Tools : Pandas, NumPy, PySpark, Scikit-Learn 
• Big-Data Tools : Spark 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE: 
 
 
Client: Atos, India                                                                     June 2019 - Aug 2021 
Role: Java Developer 
Responsibilities: 
• Involved in the analysis, design and development phases of the Software Development 
LifeCycle (SDLC)

Role: Java Developer 
Responsibilities: 
• Involved in the analysis, design and development phases of the Software Development 
LifeCycle (SDLC) 
 
• Used Rational Rose to generated Use case diagrams, Class diagrams and Sequence diagrams 
that modelled the design details of the application. 
 
• Developed UI screens using JSP, Struts tags and HTML.

• Used MVC Framework, based on the Model View Controller architecture, for rapid 
application development and ease of maintenance. 
 
• Used Validation framework for client-side validation and Internationalisation to support 
multiple languages. 
 
• Implemented several design patterns such as Business Delegate, MVC, Singleton and 
Factory to resolve the most common design issues 
 
• Used Junit framework for Unit testing of application and Clear Case for version control 
 
• Used Log4J to generate log files for the application. 
 
• Worked on Angular 2 service which interacts with RESTful services at backend.  
 
• Implemented PL/SQL and Stored procedures for Oracle9i database 
 
• Used XML parser APIs like DOM for marshalling and unmarshalling of data 
 
• Used Eclipse for writing JSPs, Struts and other java code snippets 
 
Environment:  Java /J2EE, Multithreading, EJB, Core Java, Collections, Spring MVC, JMS, HTML, JSP,

JSON, JQuery, XML, AngularJS, JavaScript, CSS3, Eclipse IDE, GIT. 
 
 
Client: Acoustic, TX Nov 2022 – Present 
     
Role: Data Analyst 
 
    
Responsibilities:  
     
 
 • Utilized Python, R, and SAS for statistical analysis and data modeling, leading to a 25% increase in 
prediction accuracy and enhanced decision-making support. 
 
• Implemented AWS-based big data solutions, resulting in a 30% reduction in data processing time 
and enabling scalable data analytics. 
 
• Developed interactive dashboards and reports using Tableau and Power BI, delivering real-time 
insights and improving business stakeholder engagement by 20%. 
 
• Applied machine learning algorithms using Pandas, NumPy, PySpark, and Scikit-Learn to predict 
customer behavior, resulting in a 15% increase in targeted marketing efficiency.

• Applied machine learning algorithms using Pandas, NumPy, PySpark, and Scikit-Learn to predict 
customer behavior, resulting in a 15% increase in targeted marketing efficiency. 
 
• Integrated Spark for real-time big data processing, achieving a 40% improvement in data 
ingestion speed and enabling more timely business decisions. 
 
• Created automated data cleaning and preprocessing pipelines using Python libraries like Pandas 
and NumPy, reducing data preparation time by 50%. 
 
• Leveraged AWS cloud services to deploy scalable data processing solutions, achieving a 35% cost 
reduction in infrastructure maintenance. 
• Utilized Machine Learning Tools like Scikit-Learn to develop predictive models, resulting in a 20% 
increase in forecast accuracy for sales and revenue. 
 
• Improved data visualization and reporting efficiency by 30% through the implementation of 
advanced BI tools such as Tableau and Power BI, providing actionable insights to key stakeholders.

• Improved data visualization and reporting efficiency by 30% through the implementation of 
advanced BI tools such as Tableau and Power BI, providing actionable insights to key stakeholders. 
 
• Designed and implemented a real-time data streaming architecture using Spark, leading to a 50% 
decrease in latency and enabling immediate analysis of business-critical data. 
 
• Enhanced collaboration between data analysts and other teams by 20% through the development 
of shared data lakes and analytics tools, leveraging AWS and Spark.

• Applied advanced machine learning techniques to fraud detection, reducing fraudulent activities 
by 10% and saving the organization significant financial resources. 
 
 
Client: Macquaries Group, Philadelphia, PA Sep 2021 – Oct 2022 
Role: Data Analyst 
Responsibilities: 
 
 
• Implemented ETL Processes with AWS Glue and Spark Streamlined data extraction, 
transformation, and loading, resulting in a 30% increase in data pipeline efficiency and 
reduced latency. 
 
• Built Predictive Maintenance Models using Scikit-Learn Enabled a 15% reduction in 
equipment downtime in manufacturing processes by predicting failures using machine 
learning algorithms. 
 
• Designed Real-time Dashboards with Tableau and Power BI  Integrated with Spark for live 
data feed, enhancing decision-making with up-to-the-minute data and improving 
operational responsiveness by 25%. 
 
• Optimized Inventory Management through Machine Learning Utilized Pandas and NumPy

operational responsiveness by 25%. 
 
• Optimized Inventory Management through Machine Learning Utilized Pandas and NumPy 
for data analysis, resulting in a 10% decrease in inventory costs and a 5% increase in sales 
through better stock availability. 
 
• Deployed Scalable Data Lakes using AWS Facilitated big data storage and analysis, leading 
to a 50% increase in data accessibility across the organization and supporting agile 
analytics. 
 
• Automated Anomaly Detection in Financial Transactions Applied SAS and Python for 
statistical modeling, reducing manual review efforts by 40% and enhancing fraud detection 
capabilities. 
 
• Enhanced Customer Segmentation with PySpark and Scikit-Learn Supported targeted 
marketing campaigns, resulting in a 15% higher conversion rate and more personalized 
customer experiences. 
 
• Developed Geo-spatial Analysis using Python and Power BI Enabled a 20% improvement in

marketing campaigns, resulting in a 15% higher conversion rate and more personalized 
customer experiences. 
 
• Developed Geo-spatial Analysis using Python and Power BI Enabled a 20% improvement in 
supply chain logistics through better route planning and location-based insights. 
 
• Facilitated Compliance Reporting using Tableau and SAS Streamlined regulatory reporting 
processes, leading to a 30% reduction in time spent on compliance tasks and improving 
accuracy in alignment with legal requirements.
